subject: Re: Re: Order #SSN1613 confirmed
description_text:
Thank you, I appreciate!

Just one more question - will the cable and mounting element be included to
the haptic reactor?

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomasz Bogdan,  Includes bracket, screws, and power cable.

That's great, thank you very much.

W dniu śr., 4 cze 2025 o 08:39 service@simsonn.com
ID 为 44 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单44  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN1613 confirmed  
      描述:  Hello! 
 As I read the info after the purchase, that VAM Pro reactors will be sent the earliest at 10th of July - - is there any chance to have it shipped separately, please? I would be grateful for receiving my pedals a bit earlier. 
   
   
 Thanks a lot! 
 Greetings, Tom
